Sea waves cup season 2

Social Media Announcement

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Sea Waves cup (@seawavescup)

HONOR SEA Waves Cup 2021 started

08:49, 07.09.2021 

Tournament organizer Sea Waves hosts the HONOR SEA Waves Cup 2021 tournament for Dota 2 teams from Southeast Asia.

The tournament is powered by Hawk.live. All matches will be streamed on the official Twitch channel – HawkMedia. 

Participants:

  1. Omega Esports
  2. It’s a prank
  3. Team Mystery
  4. The Prime
  5. Shinigami
  6. Team Veteran
  7. TEAM DAVAO
  8. Team Quantic

The tournament HONOR SEA Waves Cup 2021 will be held online on September 7 – 30. The prize pool is $11,000.

Winner

Team Quantic
